context/4: All right, Miss Howard, let's get down to cases.
context/5: But he had no opportunity to warn you that I built that stand myself.
context/7: He wanted to see if I was bluffing.
context/8: During the recess, the owner of that garage even ran home to make sure the stand was there.
context/9: I don't know what you're talking about.

context/0: What about Dr. Crippen?
context/1: Now that's the thing.
